## padStart variable

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

字符串前置补全，eg: `'1' => '00000001'`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
padStart: any
```

## Remarks

字符串前置补全

## Example


```js
padStart('1', 8)  // => '       1'
padStart('1', 8, '0')  // => '00000001'
padStart('1', 8, '*')  // => '*******1'

```
